myfinance.title: MyFinance
myfinance.description: MyFinance is a personal finance management app I built to help users track expenses, set budgets, and visualize their financial health with interactive charts. This project demonstrates my ability to create practical, real-world solutions with modern tools and a focus on user experience.

welcomeInterface.title: Welcome Interface
features: Initial screen with texts and images introducing the application to the user.

authenticationAndSecurity.title: Authentication and Security
features: The system allows new users to register, log in, and recover passwords via email.
For authentication, a token-based system (JWT) is used. When logging in with correct credentials, a token is generated with a two-hour validity, which is automatically invalidated upon logout.
Passwords are not stored in plain text; instead, encryption methods are used to ensure security.

financialSummary.title: Financial Summary
features: Interactive dashboard with detailed charts.
Monthly summary including income, expenses, savings, and available balance.
Yearly information organized by month, bimonthly, quarterly, or semi-annually.
Month-to-month savings tracking.
Detailed breakdown of each transaction: title, amount, category, assigned goal, and other key details.

financialManagement.title: Financial Management
features: Register, view, edit, and delete financial transactions.
Classify transactions as income, expense, or savings.
Use custom labels for better organization.
Link transactions to financial goals.
Interactive calendar to schedule important financial events.
View established goals and recurring events (frequent income and expenses).
Create and track personal financial goals, such as saving or expense control.

reports.title: Reports
features: Generate PDF documents with user-selected data for analysis or backup.

userProfile.title: User Profile
features: Manage personal data with options to view, edit, and delete information.

customSettings.title: Custom Settings
features: Adjust interface colors to enhance user experience.
Customize labels to categorize financial transactions.
